welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Calabar, known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer during your visit."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Calabar Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Calabar Airport, handling freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Akwa Ibom International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Akwa Ibom International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. However, the signal may be weak in some areas.
